at.ac.acdh.transformer.utils

Class X3mlFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.acdh.transformer.utils.X3mlFacade

  • public class X3mlFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    dostojic X3mlFacade class is facade for X3ML model API It provides API for creating X3ML objects and building x3ml mapping from values configured in mapping xml

      • createEntity

        public Entity createEntity(java.lang.String type,

        Parameters:
        type -
        hasType -
        var -
        globVar -
        Returns:
        X3ML Entity Entity can have a list of Additional nodes but in our case there is only situation when additional represents hasType E55_Type relationship
        See Also:
        In other cases create Entity with createEntity(type) and Additional with create Additional and call entity.getAdditional().add(additional) to add it, Entity

        public InstanceGenerator createLocalTermURI_CLARIN(java.lang.String hierarchy,
                                                   java.lang.String xpath)
        LocalTermURI_CLARIN InstanceGenerator is based on LocalTermURI and it generates entity urls in form http://www.clarin.eu/{hierarchy}/{term}

        xpath - - xpath from which value will be obtained
